response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our unique product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $10,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it for $12,000. This price reflects its true worth while ensuring a fair deal for both parties. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies us both.", "product_price": 12000}
